The (temple) Capital

Home to over ten million people(and much more int the metro region), Bankok has endless sights, it's streetlight meseums, temples and skyline definitely mean you can spend countless hours trying to look or photos. On the other hand, its insane trafic diagnosed urban planning(it lacked proper zoning until recently) and hot humid wheather. Neverther the less,below are some of my favourites
